00041 #include "pizSequenceApply.h"
00042 
00043 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00044 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00045 #pragma mark -
00046 
00047 bool pizSequenceApplyAmbitus (PIZSequence *x)
00048 {
00049     long i, scale;
00050     bool haveChanged = false;
00051 
00052     PIZLOCK
00053     
00054     scale = pizGrowingArrayCount (x->scale);
00055 
00056     for (i = 0; i < pizGrowingArrayCount (x->map); i++) {   
00057         PIZNote *note       = NULL;
00058         PIZNote *nextNote   = NULL;
00059         
00060         long p = pizGrowingArrayValueAtIndex (x->map, i);
00061         
00062         pizLinklistPtrAtIndex (x->timeline[p], 0, (void **)&note);
00063             
00064         while (note) {
00065             long tempPitch;
00066             
00067             pizLinklistNextByPtr (x->timeline[p], (void *)note, (void **)&nextNote);
00068             
00069             tempPitch = pizSequenceMovePitchToAmbitus (x, note->data[PIZ_PITCH]);
00070             
00071             if (note->data[PIZ_PITCH] != tempPitch) {
00072                     haveChanged = true;
00073                     note->data[PIZ_PITCH] = tempPitch;
00074                 }
00075                 
00076             note = nextNote;
00077         }
00078     }
00079     
00080     PIZUNLOCK
00081     
00082     return haveChanged;
00083 }
00084 
00085 bool pizSequenceApplyPattern (PIZSequence *x)
00086 {
00087     long patternSize;
00088     
00089     bool haveChanged = false;
00090     
00091     PIZLOCK
00092     
00093     if (patternSize = pizGrowingArrayCount (x->pattern)) {
00094         long i;
00095         long index = 0;
00096         
00097         for (i = 0; i < pizGrowingArrayCount (x->map); i++) {   
00098             PIZNote *note       = NULL;
00099             PIZNote *nextNote   = NULL;
00100             
00101             long p = pizGrowingArrayValueAtIndex (x->map, i);
00102             
00103             pizLinklistPtrAtIndex (x->timeline[p], 0, (void **)&note);
00104             
00105             while (note) {
00106                 long err = PIZ_GOOD;
00107                 long newPosition;
00108                 
00109                 pizLinklistNextByPtr (x->timeline[p], (void *)note, (void **)&nextNote);
00110                 
00111                 newPosition = pizSequenceSnapPositionToPattern (x, note->position, patternSize);
00112                 
00113                 if (newPosition != note->position) {
00114                     err |= (newPosition < 0);
00115                     err |= (newPosition > (PIZ_SEQUENCE_TIMELINE_SIZE - MAX (note->data[PIZ_DURATION], 1)));
00116                     
00117                     if (err) {
00118                         pizSequenceRemoveNote (x, note);
00119                     } else {
00120                         x->notes1[index] = note;
00121                         x->values1[index] = newPosition;
00122                         index ++;
00123                         haveChanged = true;
00124                     }
00125                 }
00126                     
00127                 note = nextNote;
00128             }
00129         }
00130         
00131         if (haveChanged) {
00132             for (i = 0; i < index; i++) {
00133                 pizSequenceMoveNote (x, x->notes1[i], x->values1[i]);
00134             }
00135         
00136             pizSequenceMakeMap (x);
00137         }
00138     }
00139     
00140     PIZUNLOCK
00141     
00142     return haveChanged; 
00143 }
